sourcesContent:
Users List

{{ user.name }}
{{ user.phone }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'], }) export class UsersComponent { users: any = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit() { this.http .get('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users') .subscribe(this.handleServerResponse.bind(this)); } handleServerResponse(response: any) { this.users = response; } saveUser() { this.http.post('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users', { name: 'test nme', username: 'testname', phone: 1234567, email: 'test@example.com', }); } updateUser() { this.http.put('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users', { name: 'test nme', username: 'testname', phone: 1234567, email: 'test@example.com', }); } }
